title: Amir From Iran
description:
Conan is joined by Amir from Tehran to hear firsthand about the situation in Iran, what it’s like to live through revolution, and what we can do to help.


 

Find a transcript of this episode here: https://teamcoco.com/amir-from-iran


 

Wanna get a chance to talk to Conan? Submit here: TeamCoco.com/CallConan
author: conaf@teamcoco.com (Team Coco & Earwolf)
